sentences.english: He tried in a hundred ways to convey his own feelings, casting arch glances at them.

sentences.english: Then Hampton makes a mistake and the suspect is able to capture her.

sentences.english: Then Qi's crack troops rushed out from the gates to attack the now terrified and utterly confused troops.

sentences.english: Screeners took the opportunity to seriously explain use of false will be severely punished.
